articles.content:
Justin Lin quit as director of Fast 10 because star Vin Diesel is so difficult, according to a source with knowledge of the situation.

articles.title: Judge Tosses Part Of Blac Chyna Case Against Kim Kardashian - HuffPost
articles.description: Jurors went home Friday without reaching a verdict after their first full day of deliberations.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES (AP) A judge on Friday threw out part of the case against Kim Kardashian in former reality TV star Blac Chynas lawsuit while the jury deliberates on the elements that remain.
